name: Automate_Duty v2.0.0
summary: v2.0.0 - uses a python script to search for files required for Dry Lab transfer, creates a CSV file with URL links for the files and sends an email to MokaGuys

inputSpec.name: project_type
inputSpec.label: Type of Project
inputSpec.help: Type of project: WES, SNP, TSO500, MokaPpe

outputSpec.name: Email_with_CSV_attachment
outputSpec.label: Email_with_CSV_attachment
outputSpec.help: URL links are saved in a csv file which is sent to MokaGuys for processing by Duty Bioinformatician
